dmca.title: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION TELEVISON SERIES
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Dennis L. Wilson [mailto:dwilson@kmwlaw.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 19, 2005 4:24 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION TELEVISON SERIES



Dennis L. Wilson

Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP

9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite

Beverly Hills, CA 90212

U.S.A.

Tel: (310) 248-3830

Fax: (310) 860-0363

December 19, 2005

VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

AND U.S. MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com> abuse@theplanet.com,
<mailto:admins@theplanet.com> admins@theplanet.com,
<mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com> legal-response@theplanet.com

Re:      UNAUTHORIZED USE OF PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION TELEVISON SERIES

                        <http://www.boxedtvseries.com>
http://www.boxedtvseries.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter being written to you on behalf of our client, Paramount Pictures
Corporation (hereinafter "Paramount").  As you have already been made aware,
Paramount is the owner of all copyright, trademark and other intellectual
property rights in and to the "Star Trek" and "Sex And The City" television
series.  No one is authorized to copy, reproduce, distribute, or otherwise
use the "Star Trek" and "Sex And The City" television series without the
express written permission of Paramount. 

As we informed you in our letters dated November 14, 2005 and November 23,
2005, the web site located at " <http://www.boxedtvseries.com,>
http://www.boxedtvseries.com," for which you are the service provider, is
reproducing and distributing, distribute and/or offer for sale the "Star
Trek" and "Sex And The City" television series.  The infringing material is
specifically located on the main page of the website. 

Paramount has the good faith belief that the use of the material in the
manner complained of is not authorized by Paramount, its agent or the law.
Paramount diligently enforces its rights in the "Sex And The City" and "Star
Trek" television series in all forms of media.  Our client rightfully takes
its responsibility for the protection of the "Sex And The City" and "Star
Trek" television series very seriously.

Internet Service Providers can be held liable if they do not respond to
claims of infringement pursuant to the requirements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).  In accordance with the DMCA, we again
request your assistance in the removal of infringements of the "Star Trek"
and "Sex And The City" television series from this web site and any other
sites for which you act as an Internet Service Provider.  We further declare
under penalty of perjury that we are authorized to act on behalf of
Paramount and that the information in this letter is accurate.  Please
contact me immediately to discuss this matter further.

Nothing contained in this letter constitutes an express or implied waiver of
any rights, remedies or defenses of Paramount, all of which are expressly
reserved.

        Very truly yours,



        Dennis L. Wilson

        Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP

DLW:vf

Enclosures (via mail)

cc:        Paramount Pictures Corporation
